post.body: I wish I did. I drank too midi I'm going to feel this tommoroe
I grew up in the 90's music from then rocked. Bone thugs, tlc, sugar ray, smashing pumpkins..... God I'm wasted
shouldn't it be the color of the sand?
no problem. You're from Cali, I had to
mix soco with dr pepper, godlyness. And it was bitter and cold here all day long
hum.... Sounds intersting. Thanksgiving dinner for new years?
hey!! West coast? Nice!!
that is the best show, EVER. Shelton is freaking hiliarious!
so now that your home you should have nooooo problem grinding to 80 and playing with me again ;)
that's a pretty sweet house. When are you going to eat it?
for whom do you work for? I guess that'd be the deciding factor based off the pic
i'm sure any strait male driver would deliver their 'package' to anyone with a 'box' haha
why does it seem like your turning into a homeless shelter for cats!!! :D This gonna be cat #2 u take in?
ha! Undead Mage or priest? Your toon looks very close to my 78 undead priest!! I don't use staves, more spell power to maces
I don't either, just trying to cheer u up, that's all
ain't nothing a little booze can't fix right? :D
alex, let me know if it's worth see as I'm a HUGE wrestling fan
0.o why does it make ya feel old?! In my opinion I stopped getting older at 21, and so did everyone else ;$ we're all 21 :D
oh... Jeez did not know that. Was born in 85 but don't remember any music from that era, sorry lol
end of the world?why would you say such a thing!!
I feel the same way. I feel a nasty cold brewing within me. I hate colds...
what level u now alex?
we finished strong last year too. I think reid is doing fine. Some people need to realize how much he does, he does a lot
I don't think he did a bad job this season. The players just didn't work well to start but now they're sailing.
good morning to you as well. Wish I could of slept till 7:30, had to be up at 6:30 for a 7:30 start :/
word? Any major improvements?
thanks. I was okay, revealed my real thoughts to my ex was my only mistake. My thoughts are good at least
alright actually. Last night was a good night
it'd depend on the situation really
guess you gave him a good time! Your a little too expensive for me :P :)
it's not hard now... We 23 manned it. And 20 manned the heroic wintergrasp dude too.
no not in real life, in game lol... U can say it, I've come to terms that I'm a need :P
thanks, what realm ya on?
world of Warcraft.
every but last three. Were cleared all four constructs. Being a healer on patchwerk sucks, freaking mortal strikes for 30k
what's the name of your hunter? And will we see him in future projectlore episodes???
Btw I love u guys.... Go to YouTube and watch imagine by john Lennon
I'm so drunk haha
Shit..... Bottle gone.... Someone bring me more soco
Southern comfort + Dr. Pepper with a little WoW = a good way to kill lonelyness
Ordered me a pino's cheese steak and fries, what a lonely night, ugh
Even though it's cold out, it's still a nice night of waiting. God bless I gave my sister a spare key, she bailed me out tonight.
Well, here we go. I freaking locked myself out....... Again. God dammit
Well, no 3G iPhone, but a brand new 1st gen iPhone. I didn't know they made these still.
At lehigh valley mall at the apple store waiting for my apt. on my top right screen "burn" marks praying they offer a 3g replacement
Ladies and gentleman, I finally hit level 80. Let the rep grind begin! http://snipurl.com/8wcvb
It's snowing!
I can't believe it's only 9 days until christmas! To think, this is my last season in retail! Thank god I'm grad. from college this semester
Night everyone. I just realized I never changed out of my pjs all day. Damn I feel like a bum. Oh well, it was worth my epic flyer in wow ;)
Advise to everyone out there. Never trust what your ex says. They only keep you around for their personal insecurity. Stay the hell away!
Happy 2009 everyone!
Is it me, or does Dick Clark look horrible. He's trying so hard, it makes me feel bad for him.
Thanksgiving dinner theme for new years with @adamdrago and @gilliancarroll. Awesome food! http://snipurl.com/9bomc
Look at the puppy! http://snipurl.com/9bkec
Oh, and just fyi, I'm a holy priest.... If you were curious.
And lastly, new chest piece. http://snipurl.com/9axtv
New shoulder piece http://snipurl.com/9axss
And we did it with only 23 people. Cleared all but three bosses too. Here is my new neck piece. http://snipurl.com/9axry
For all the world of Warcraft players out there, the next few tweets will be of my new gear from heroic naxx http://snipurl.com/9axqm
And I'm the league champion of my NFL fantasy season! Awesome!!! http://snipurl.com/99pnk
